探索遗传联系：酒精、吸烟、咖啡摄入和关节炎风险饮酒、吸烟、咖啡摄入量与关节炎风险之间的遗传关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Exploring-the-genic-links-Alcohol-smoking-coffee-intake-and-arthritis-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Exploring-the-genic-links-Alcohol-smoking-coffee-intake-and-arthritis-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a51edeb-f092-461a-9bf6-0d214cc61edb Wed, 06 Dec 2023 07:24:00 -0500 Exploring the genetic links: Alcohol, smoking, coffee intake, and arthritis risk
加利福尼亚州住院患者 COVID-19 死亡率的种族差异种族与加利福尼亚州 2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 住院治疗结果之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Ethnic-disparities-in-COVID-19-mortality-rates-among-hospitalized-病人-in-California.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Ethnic-disparities-in-COVID-19-mortality-rates-among-hospitalized-病人-in-California.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b7af152-2279-4935-95b3-b651d47a2796 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 06:48:00 -0500 Ethnic disparities in COVID-19 mortality rates among hospitalized patients in California
研究揭示有妊娠期高血压病史的西班牙裔女性的亚临床心脏变化妊娠期新发高血压疾病对心脏的长期影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Study-reveals-subclinical-cardiac-changes-in-Hispanic-women-with-history-of-hypertential-pregnancy-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Study-reveals-subclinical-cardiac-changes-in-Hispanic-women-with-history-of-hypertential-pregnancy-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d88515dc-96c7-4b03-a5d3-999c1e011814 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 06:18:00 -0500 Study reveals subclinical cardiac changes in Hispanic women with history of hypertensive pregnancy disorders
新研究利用数学模型将科罗拉多州立大学皮疹分为五类慢性自发性荨麻疹 (CSU) 是一种以突然出疹为特征的皮肤病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/New-study-classizes-CSU-skin-eruptions-into- Five-categories-using-mathematical-modeling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/New-study-classizes-CSU-skin-eruptions-into- Five-categories-using-mathematical-modeling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a85ec10-1d1f-421f-bbd6-f0fba563c1b9 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:17:00 -0500 New study classifies CSU skin eruptions into five categories using mathematical modeling
开创性的愿景：迈克尔·史赛克 (Michael Stryker) 对理解视觉皮层的贡献在神经科学学会 2023 年神经科学大会上进行的这次采访中，我们与 Michael Stryker 教授一起探索了神经科学的迷人世界，他是一位拥有四十多年开创性研究的领先专家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Pioneering-Visions-Michael-Strykers-Contributions-to-Understanding-the-Visual-Cortex.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Pioneering-Visions-Michael-Strykers-Contributions-to-Understanding-the-Visual-Cortex.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc3109a8-39f6-4465-82da-bd96e1c9c999 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 05:09:00 -0500 Pioneering Visions: Michael Stryker's Contributions to Understanding the Visual Cortex
研究表明 BMI 升高与 SARS-CoV-2 感染后免疫反应减弱有关研究人员评估了 BMI 升高对 SARS-CoV-2 体液免疫水平的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Study-links-elevated-BMI-to-weaker-immune-response-post-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Study-links-elevated-BMI-to-weaker-immune-response-post-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=950ef7e4-ebea-4cde-98e9-1a5e212b1c80 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 04:55:00 -0500 Study links elevated BMI to weaker immune response post-SARS-CoV-2 infection
在患有晚期前列腺癌的男性中使用新型激素治疗药物是否存在种族和民族差异？研究人员评估了晚期前列腺癌（PCa）患者使用新型激素疗法（NHT）的种族差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Are-there-racial-and-ethnic-disparities-in-the-use-of-novel-hormonal-therapy-agents-in-men-with-晚期前列腺癌.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231206/Are-there-racial-and-ethnic-disparities-in-the-use-of-novel-hormonal-therapy-agents-in-men-with-晚期前列腺癌.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4223a298-6566-4baa-b073-77b4e1f47422 Wed, 06 Dec 2023 04:27:00 -0500 Are there racial and ethnic disparities in the use of novel hormonal therapy agents in men with advanced prostate cancer?
提议“GREAT PLEA”系统在医疗保健领域负责任地使用生成式人工智能NPJ Digital Medicine 的一项研究回顾了人工智能在军事和医疗保健领域的伦理指南，提出了“GREAT PLEA”系统，以促进人工智能在临床研究中的伦理应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/GREAT-PLEA-system-propose-for-responsible-use-of-generative-AI-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/GREAT-PLEA-system-propose-for-responsible-use-of-generative-AI-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d641094d-1687-493f-96e4-fbd6e86ac66b Tue, 05 Dec 2023 23:25:00 -0500 'GREAT PLEA' system proposed for responsible use of generative AI in healthcare
研究表明，不规则的睡眠模式与老年人认知能力下降有关研究发现，睡眠时间短和睡眠模式的高度可变性与老年人的认知障碍显着相关，这凸显了持续睡眠对认知健康的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Irregular-sleep-patterns-linked-to-cognitive-decline-in-older-adults-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Irregular-sleep-patterns-linked-to-cognitive-decline-in-older-adults-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68b613d6-732f-48ea-8ee3-11f6b89c4c2f Tue, 05 Dec 2023 23:02:00 -0500 Irregular sleep patterns linked to cognitive decline in older adults, study shows
交感神经系统和免疫相互作用：代谢调节的关键《Advanced Science》的一篇评论探讨了免疫系统和交感神经系统在调节胰腺、肝脏和脂肪组织等重要代谢器官中的相互作用。这项全面的分析提供了对影响代谢的神经免疫关系的见解，为代谢疾病提供了潜在的新治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Sympathetic-nervous-system-and-immune-interplay-Key-to-metabolic-regulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231205/Sympathetic-nervous-system-and-immune-interplay-Key-to-metabolic-regulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d43db9ba-1966-44da-87cb-2bd54c1fee05 Tue, 05 Dec 2023 22:31:00 -0500 Sympathetic nervous system and immune interplay: Key to metabolic regulation
